Text: RE Enron Employee Email Cc SteveLance Per your request please see the attached memo which was distributed to staff in Europe Thanks Fiona Original Message From McVicker Maureen On Behalf Of Kean Steven J Sent November To Gentle Jackie Grant Fiona Subject Enron Employee Email Jackie Fiona Please send via email a copy of the email that we out to all the Enron Europe employees Please send it to me and Lance Schuler hes in Enrons legal Thanks for your help its important that we receive this as soon as possible

FW HBSIESE OctSteve Thought you would be interested in learning that the HBS event in Madrid which Pankaj Ghemawat was organising has now been postponed John Thompson had planned to participate from Enron and I believe will likely do so once we have a new date from Pankaj Thanks Fiona Original Message From Thompson Barbara Sent October To Grant Fiona Bauer Kate Subject FW HBSIESE Oct FYI Barbara Original Message From Pankaj Ghemawat mailto Sent October To Thompson Barbara Subject Re HBSIESE Oct Dear Barbara Thanks very much for trying multiple methods to reach me As it so happens given the economic slowdown peoples reluctance to travel et cetera the decision was taken this morning to postpone the HarvardIESE program So while we remain very interested in having Mr Thompson or some other senior manager from Enron comment on the discussion of the Enron case which I wrote the session is in the process of getting rescheduled Ill get back in touch as soon as we have a new date Thanks again Pankaj At you wrote Dear Prof Ghemawat Having left a message on your answer phone earlier today it is perhaps best to also send you a brief note with our query whether you are still looking for an Enron speaker for the above event Id be grateful if you could let me know in the next few days either by phone or email Many thanks Barbara Thompson ph cell This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW TEESSIDE POWER STATION INCIDENT UPDATE Cc FYI The following internal statement was sent out this morning to all staff in EuropeJapanAustralia We are on standby to prepare any further announcements that may need to be sent out to staff but at this juncture we do not anticipate any additional updates will be sent out today Alex Parsons is working with Richard Lewis and his team to flesh out an internal QA etc so that we are prepared for reactive purposes regarding the commercial operations of the plant more information to follow on this front as soon as it is available Further the media statement which was distributed to members of the press this morning at has been posted on the European website wwweuropeenroncom Thanks Fiona Original Message From Enron Europe General CT On Behalf Of Enron Europe Office of the Chairman Sent August To ECT NRON ECT Asia NRON Subject TEESSIDE POWER STATION INCIDENT UPDATE TEESSIDE POWER STATION INCIDENT UPDATE UPDATE AUGUST Teesside Power Station remains off line today following the tragic incident yesterday which claimed the life of a third Enron employee overnight Two other members of staff died at the scene and a fourth remains in hospital in a stable condition Our priority is to offer all possible support to the families of these employees and a support team has spent some time with them Any help and assistance which can be given will continue to be offered over the coming days and weeks Steps are being taken to support friends and colleagues throughout the company and Enrons Chief Executive Officer in the United States Jeff Skilling has flown to the region to meet with staff today Meanwhile Enron is cooperating fully with all the appropriate authorities including the Health and Safety Executive in an attempt to establish what caused the incident No decision will be taken for several days regarding future operation of the plant More information will be provided as soon as it becomes available The Public Relations department is handling all media enquires Should you receive any enquiries about the incident they should be directed to John Sherriff and Michael Brown

Update Cc All Further to my earlier email I thought the following information would be of use to you Jeff Skilling and Tim Underdown held a short press briefing at pm this afternoon a transcript from the briefing has been posted on the European website wwweuropeenroncom and a quick simple note is being circulated to staff in Europe Japan and Australia advising them how to access the transcript Paul Lund with Standard Poors Infrastructure Financing Ratings division contacted us to advise SP plan to issue a statement on Teesside Power Finance Limited this afternoon regarding the situation at Teesside power station We have run the statement by Richard Lewis and Legal and are requesting two minor changes be made before it is released but in principle the statement is accurate and we have no issues with it See attached amended document In terms of enquiries that are coming in to us on the commercial viability of the plant we have agreed with Richard Lewis that we will not enter into any discussions of this nature Our focus as a company is on supporting the friends and family of the victims and to cooperate with the investigation into the cause of the explosion not to comment on the commercial impact of the plant being off line Finally we expect to be in a position to release the names of the four employees tomorrow once they have been formally identified We are hoping that the Health and Safety Executive will be able to release at a minimum its preliminary findings by early next week at the latest More information to follow on both issues Fiona

MG Staff Visits Tuesday Wednesday and ThursdayTHIS WEEK Cc As you know we will be hosting staff from MG tomorrow evening and on Wednesday and Thursday evening for a presentationoverview on Enron and a tour of Enron House The MG Staff have not been selected by department for these events but rather have been given the option to sign up on a firstcome firstserve basis I anticipate having approximately people on Tuesday on Wednesday and on Thursday The members of MGs management who joined us on the th of June are not attending this week in order to provide their colleagues with an opportunity to visit the building hence the smaller numbers The purpose of these events is to help MG staff get better acquainted with Enron and to see firsthand where they will be relocating to in September To this end I would like to invite all of you to attend at least one of three events with a view to being on hand to act as a hosthostess potentially join tours of the building and to be on hand to field any specific questions which may come up about your respective departments I hope this will also prove to be a good opportunity for you to meet MG staff on a more informal basis The schedule of events each night will be as follows MG Staff Arrive at Enron House Welcome and Introductions Eric Gadd Enron Video Presentation on Enron and Enron Europe Mark Schroeder Tuesday Fernley Dyson Wednesday John Thompson Thursday Tours of Enron HouseDrinks Canaps Depart for Home by Bus to Liverpool Street Station or Directly from Enron House I know that many of you have been keen to participate in this kind of informal event with our new colleagues at MG so I hope you will be able to join us So that we can get a feel for numbers I would appreciate it if you could RSVP to me by pm tomorrow regarding your participation for all three events Please note that due to a number of Enron staff participating in the Chase Corporate Challenge on Wednesday evening I am very short on tour guides So if you can make it on Wednesday evening and if you feel up to it please advise if you can lead a tour of the building a map and cheat sheet will be provided Regards Fiona

Re Steve Keans Presentation at Upcoming Eurelectric Annual Mtg Cc As requested in Peters note regarding Steves upcoming presentation at the Eurelectric Annual Meeting I have pulled four articles from our German press archives on California We only archive Enron mentions so the file was limited to the four above only The original articles were obviously in German but what I have provided are simply our Agencys summary of the articles key points in English I hope this proves useful Please let me know if there is anything else we can provide Thanks Fiona x
